thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice hotel
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Chuck49ers
title: Very nice hotel
text: The hotel is very nice and I would give it 41/2 stars. The room was clean and large size with very modern decor. The nice thing about the room was we had two queen beds which is hard to find at hotels near SFO. Beds were very comfortable and firm (but not hard). The hotel room was little noisier than previous stays due to planes flying over hotel which was unusual and maybe attributed wind direction change at SFO. It did quiet down after 10:00pm so we did get a good night's sleep. The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful in trying to satisfy your needs. The hotel offers complimentary parking. The shuttle bus service has improved over previous visits. The shuttle bus was right on schedule from SFO to hotel. I would recommend this hotel and plan to stay in the future.
